Fri Apr 28 11:34:13 2017

library(shiny)
library(tm)
## Loading required package: NLP
library(wordcloud)
## Loading required package: RColorBrewer
library(twitteR)
library(ROAuth)


shinyServer(function(input, output, session) {
  consumer_key <- "hh3tbRo5PpFpd0qEfmGXenSsS"
  consumer_secret <- "GVcQOuQ8eLzmxYfqyEU6dYvzzGFJPYKc2aR4Lp5JK195Xb7NSs"
  access_token <- "482413194-JfqqJe7Vh0MAnZnfraGfQ5BvcTOoIoF1Ocm0FGPQ"
  access_secret <- "HkE9exoVyqngXbaYe04912NEOPmPX6wHlm292D1GzsmMW"
  setup_twitter_oauth(consumer_key,consumer_secret,access_token,access_secret)
  token <- get("oauth_token", twitteR:::oauth_cache)
  token$cache()
  output$currentTime <- renderText({invalidateLater(1000, session)
    paste("Current time is: ",Sys.time())})
  observe({
    invalidateLater(60000,session)
    count_positive = 0
    count_negative = 0
    count_neutral = 0
    pos <- scan('~/Website/positivewords.txt', what='character', comment.char=';') #folder with positive dictionary
    neg <- scan('~/Website/negativewords.txt', what='character', comment.char=';') #folder with negative dictionary
    positive_text <- vector()
    negative_text <- vector()
    neutral_text <- vector()
    vector_users <- vector()
    vector_sentiments <- vector()
    tweets_result = ""
    tweets_result = searchTwitter('Donald Trump',lang="en",n=1500,resultType="recent")
    for (tweet in tweets_result){
      print(paste(tweet$screenName, ":", tweet$text))
      vector_users <- c(vector_users, as.character(tweet$screenName))
      if (function(i) grepl(pos[i], tweet$text, ignore.case = TRUE) == TRUE)  {
        count_positive = count_positive + 1
        print("positivo")
        vector_sentiments <- c(vector_sentiments, "Positive")
        positive_text <- c(positive_text, as.character(tweet$text))
      } else if (function(i) grepl(neg[i], tweet$text, ignore.case = TRUE) == TRUE) {  
        count_negative = count_negative + 1
        print("negativo")
        vector_sentiments <- c(vector_sentiments, "Negative")
        negative_text <- c(negative_text, as.character(tweet$text))
      } else if (function(i) (grepl(pos[i], tweet$text, ignore.case = TRUE) == FALSE)
                 + (grepl(neg[i], tweet$text, ignore.case = TRUE) == FALSE)) {
        count_neutral = count_neutral + 1
        print("neutral")
        vector_sentiments <- c(vector_sentiments, "Neutral")
        neutral_text <- c(neutral_text, as.character(tweet$text))
      }
    }
    df_users_sentiment <- data.frame(vector_users, vector_sentiments)
    output$tweets_table = renderDataTable({
      df_users_sentiment
    })
    
    output$distPlot <- renderPlot({
      results = data.frame(tweets = c("Positive", "Negative", "Neutral"), numbers = c(count_positive,count_negative,count_neutral))
      barplot(results$numbers, names = results$tweets, xlab = "Sentiment", ylab = "Counts", col = c("Green","Red","Blue"))
      if (length(positive_text) > 0){
        output$positive_wordcloud <- renderPlot({ wordcloud(paste(positive_text, collapse=" "), min.freq = 10, random.color=TRUE, max.words=50 ,colors=brewer.pal(8, "Dark2"))  })
      }
      if (length(negative_text) > 0) {
        output$negative_wordcloud <- renderPlot({ wordcloud(paste(negative_text, collapse=" "), random.color=TRUE,  min.freq = 10, max.words=50 ,colors=brewer.pal(8,"Set3"))  })
      }
      if (length(neutral_text) > 0){
        output$neutral_wordcloud <- renderPlot({ wordcloud(paste(neutral_text, collapse=" "), min.freq = 10, random.color=TRUE , max.words=50 ,colors=brewer.pal(8, "Dark2"))  })
      }
    })
  })
})
